info.name: Google+ - Remove any mentions
info.description: Removes the blue arrow and the text on the front page of Google, as well as the +You link on the top bar.
info.additionalInfo: This will only work in Google.COM. If you use a local flavour of Google, you'll need to make a second style replacing the domain with your local domain. (You need a second style because Gmail or Google Reader, for example, use the .COM domain.)
